scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && bundle exec rails server
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:sidekiq" --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND,SIDEKIQ" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && bundle install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd backend && rails db:create db:migrate db:seed
